divs: sighting detailsstatement from witness to clifford clift in an email: i hope i am sending this to the right place. my wife and i live in selden, tx near stephenville where there was the ufo uproar a couple of years ago. last night 9\20\2010 some time late, i am not sure of the exact time probably about 10 pm, we stepped outside to look at the stars. there was a really bright flash of light in the sky to the east of us, towards dallas\fort worth. it was so bright it drew my attention from where i had been looking. my wife said it didn't streak, just lit up and then went out. was there some phenomena that you know of that this could have been? my wife was one of the very first to see the stephenville ufo near dublin. also one night earlier this year, to the west of us, lights were lighting up and fading out in the night sky in a line. i never heard anything about it in the news but we watched it for about a minute or so. long enough for my wife to call me downstairs and outside to see them. thanks for any info on what this flash might have been.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Selden
There were no other sightings in Selden on or around September 20th 2010
